contents: Article 20 (Umpire Evaluation) ① Member sports organizations must evaluate referees every year. ② Member sports organizations must register with the standing referees and sports organizations and prepare judgment evaluation forms by grade for the referees who participated in the competition for the relevant year, manage the referee evaluations through the member sports organization referee committee, and use them as data for promotion or assignment. . ③ Member sports organizations must set at least 20 indicators, etc. for each game according to the circumstances of each sports organization, and establish and implement separate bylaws. The bylaws must include a multi-faceted evaluation that can be evaluated by fellow judges, players, and coaches.
